name: The Faery Tale Adventure
description: The Faery Tale Adventure is a 1987 action role-playing video game designed by David Joiner and published by MicroIllusions for the Amiga, and later ported for the Commodore 64, MS-DOS, Genesis, and Macintosh. The MS-DOS version is titled The Faery Tale Adventure: Book I. The initial version was produced for the AMIGA 1000, which came widely available around 1986, and featured the largest game world to that date.
